title: Maggie Moo’s Fix Taxpayer Blues [Freebies]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Line up at Maggie Moo’s today for a free scoop of ice cream, scheduled on The Tax Day Of Doom (for some) to provide a tasty bit of relief. This is like Ben & Jerry’s Free Cone Day (which is, conveniently, coming up soon) but even more conveniently timed. (via Nashville Scene: Bites.)

UPDATE: After hearing some reports of folks being turned away, we’ve confirmed that the Green Hills, Cool Springs, and West End Maggie Moo’s locations are only doing free scoop promo from 4-6 pm today. Brentwood will be doling out the goods all day until 6. So don’t yell at the counterpeople!
